name: Hotel Paranoia
description:
You go on a trip in London and everything seems normal until the lights of the Hotel Paranoia that you visited start flickering and then turn off...You are alone and none is there to help you. Search for the electrical room and fix the lights until the threats come closer to you. Or is it too late now?

Please donate even 1$ / € because we have spent many days to make this game.

Support / bug report : https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=DQSIkWdsW0yxEjajBLZtrQAAAAAA...
